snippet: Russia’s decision to cancel a longstanding high school exchange program with the United States has opened more slots for students from Ukraine.
abstract: Russia's abrupt decision to cancel longstanding high school exchange program with United States has unforeseen consequence of opening more slots for students from Ukraine; program, initiated at the end of the Cold War, provides scholarships for students from former Soviet Union to live with an American family and study at an American high school.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s decision to cancel a longstanding high school exchange program with the United States has opened more slots for students from Ukraine.

headline.main: Ukrainian Students to Take Russians’ Places in U.S. Exchange Program
headline.print_headline: Ukrainian Students to Take Russians’ Places
